code: import React from"react";import"./custom-button.styles.scss";import{selectLevel,selectAnswered}from"../../redux/birds/birds.selector";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{goNextLevelStart,cleanBirdInfo,chooseCurrentList,changeNameList,increaseLevel,changeAudioList,resetAnswer,endGame,resetExtraScore}from"../../redux/birds/birds.action";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CustomButton=function CustomButton(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var level=useSelector(selectLevel);var answered=useSelector(selectAnswered);var handleGoNextLevel=function handleGoNextLevel(){if(answered){if(level===5){dispatch(endGame());}else{dispatch(increaseLevel());dispatch(chooseCurrentList(null));dispatch(cleanBirdInfo());dispatch(changeNameList(level));dispatch(changeAudioList(level));dispatch(resetAnswer());dispatch(goNextLevelStart());dispatch(resetExtraScore());}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:answered?"custom-button":"blockedBtn",onClick:function onClick(){handleGoNextLevel();},children:"\u0421\u043B\u0435\u0434\u0443\u044E\u0449\u0438\u0439 \u0443\u0440\u043E\u0432\u0435\u043D\u044C"})});};export default CustomButton;
